name: Moe Outbreak
description:
The concept is an Action RPG game with anime girls fighting off an invasion. Possibly a chibi invasion. As you can see the art assets aren't in the prototype just yet as it's still an early WIP so bear with me! (≧ｗ≦)

Please let me know what you think of the mechanics / controls and if you feel the number of abilities is too much. Any kind of criticism would be great so don't hold back!

You can easily reach me on Twitter @MomoyoSeiso, again I'd really appreciate any kind of feedback you have.

Thank you for taking the time to read this!
